MemberSignature.Value: public bool[,,] RawSchedule { get; set; }
.property instance bool[,,] RawSchedule
Public Property RawSchedule As Boolean(,,)
public: property cli::array <bool, 3> ^ RawSchedule { cli::array <bool, 3> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <bool, 3> ^ value); };
member this.RawSchedule : bool[,,] with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a three-dimensional array that indicates at what time during the week that the source is available for replication.

span.span: Gets or sets a three-dimensional array that indicates at what time during the week that the source is available for replication.

value.span: 一维 元素的数组，如果在特定的15分钟时间间隔内源可用于复制，则 元素。

span.span: A three-dimensional array of elements in which the element is if the source is available for replication during that specific 15-minute interval.

value.span: 如果源不可用于复制，则 元素。

span.span: The element is if the source is not available for replication.

value.span: 该数组的格式为 RawSchedule [<星期>，<小时>，<15 分钟间隔>]。

span.span: The array is in the form RawSchedule[<day-of-week>, <hour>, <15-minute interval>].

value.span: 所有这些值都是从零开始的，并且一周从星期日早上00:00 开始，协调世界时。

span.span: All of these values are zero-based and the week begins at 00:00 on Sunday morning, Coordinated Universal Time.

value.span: 下面是一周中的有效值。

span.span: The following are the valid values for the day-of-week.
Day-of-week value
Indicated day of the week.
Sunday
Monday
Tuesday
Wednesday
Thursday
Friday
Saturday

value.span: 小时是从零开始的，以24小时格式指定。

span.span: The hour is zero-based and specified in 24-hour format.
For example, 2 P.M.
would be specified as 14.
Valid values are 0-23.

value.span: 15分钟的间隔指定源可用于复制的小时内的15分钟块。

span.span: The 15-minute interval specifies the 15-minute block within the hour that the source is available for replication.

value.span: 下表列出了15分钟间隔的可能值。

span.span: The following table identifies the possible values for the 15-minute interval.
15-minute interval
Description

description.span: 源可用于从0到14分钟的时间进行复制。

span.span: The source is available for replication from 0 to 14 minutes after the hour.

description.span: 源可用于从15到29分钟的时间进行复制。

span.span: The source is available for replication from 15 to 29 minutes after the hour.

description.span: 源可用于从30到44分钟后的复制。

span.span: The source is available for replication from 30 to 44 minutes after the hour.

description.span: 源可用于从45到59分钟的时间进行复制。

span.span: The source is available for replication from 45 to 59 minutes after the hour.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性来确定源是否可用于在星期二15:50 协调世界时进行复制：The following example shows how to use this property to determine if the source is available for replication at 15:50 Coordinated Universal Time on Tuesday: ```csharp bool isAvailable = scheduleObject.RawSchedule[2, 15, 3]; ``` 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性通过将分钟除以15来计算运行时的15分钟时间间隔：The following example shows how to use this property to calculate the 15-minute interval at runtime by dividing the minutes by 15: ```csharp bool isAvailable = scheduleObject.RawSchedule[2, 15, (Int32)50/15]; ```

summary.span: Resets the entire schedule to unavailable.

span.span: Resets the entire schedule to unavailable.

summary.span: Adds a range of times for every day of the week to the schedule.

span.span: Adds a range of times for every day of the week to the schedule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法中的所有参数均包含在内。All of the parameters in this method are inclusive. 此方法是累计方法，不会删除任何现有的计划信息。This method is cumulative and does not remove any existing schedule information. 如果现有计划和新计划重叠，则结果仍将为累积的。If an existing schedule and the new schedule overlap, the result will still be cumulative. 若要清除计划，请使用 方法。To clear the schedule, use the method.

summary.span: Adds a range of times to the schedule.

span.span: Adds a range of times to the schedule.
